parameters.name: configuredTableAssociationIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the configured table association to update. Currently accepts the configured table association ID.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique ID for the membership that the configured table association belongs to.

nested_items.name: configuredTableAssociation
nested_items.description: The entire updated configured table association.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the configured table association.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the configured table association.

nested_items.name: configuredTableId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the configured table that the association refers to.

nested_items.name: configuredTableArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the configured table that the association refers to.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the membership this configured table association belongs to.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the membership this configured table association belongs to.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The service will assume this role to access catalog metadata and query the table.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the configured table association, in lowercase. The table is identified by this name when running protected queries against the underlying data.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the configured table association.

nested_items.name: analysisRuleTypes
nested_items.description: The analysis rule types for the configured table association.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time the configured table association was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time the configured table association was last updated.
